mapper.insert:
insert into ujcms_visit_log (id_, site_id_, user_id_, url_, entry_url_, source_, source_type_, country_, province_, device_, os_, browser_, user_agent_, count_, si_, uv_, ip_, date_, duration_, new_visitor_) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.entryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.device,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.si,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.uv,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.newVisitor,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT tt.site_id_ AS site_id_, tt.name_ AS name_, SUM(pv_count_) AS pv_count_, SUM(uv_count_) AS uv_count_, SUM(ip_count_) AS ip_count_, SUM(nv_count_) AS nv_count_, SUM(duration_) AS duration_, SUM(bounce_count_) AS bounce_count_ FROM (SELECT t.site_id_ AS site_id_ , t.${name} AS name_ , SUM(t.count_) AS pv_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT t.uv_) ELSE 0 END AS uv_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT t.ip_) ELSE 0 END AS ip_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN t.new_visitor_ = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS nv_count_ , MAX(duration_) AS duration_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS bounce_count_ FROM ujcms_visit_log t WHERE t.date_ >= #{begin} AND t.date_ < #{end} GROUP BY t.site_id_, t.${name}, t.si_) tt GROUP BY site_id_, name_

SELECT tt.site_id_ AS site_id_, tt.name_ AS name_, SUM(pv_count_) AS pv_count_, SUM(uv_count_) AS uv_count_, SUM(ip_count_) AS ip_count_, SUM(nv_count_) AS nv_count_, SUM(duration_) AS duration_, SUM(bounce_count_) AS bounce_count_ FROM (SELECT t.site_id_ AS site_id_ , t.province_ AS name_ , SUM(t.count_) AS pv_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT t.uv_) ELSE 0 END AS uv_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT t.ip_) ELSE 0 END AS ip_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN t.new_visitor_ = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS nv_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 THEN MAX(duration_) ELSE 0 END AS duration_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS bounce_count_ FROM ujcms_visit_log t WHERE t.date_ >= #{begin} AND t.date_ < #{end} AND t.country_ = #{country} GROUP BY t.site_id_, t.province_, t.si_) tt GROUP BY site_id_, name_

SELECT t.site_id_ AS site_id_ , t.url_ AS url_ , COUNT(*) AS pv_count_ , COUNT(DISTINCT t.uv_) AS uv_count_ , COUNT(DISTINCT t.ip_) AS ip_count_ FROM ujcms_visit_log t WHERE t.date_ >= #{begin} AND t.date_ < #{end} AND t.count_ > 0 GROUP BY t.site_id_, t.url_

SELECT t.site_id_ AS site_id_ , t.entry_url_ AS url_ , COUNT(*) AS pv_count_ , COUNT(DISTINCT t.uv_) AS uv_count_ , COUNT(DISTINCT t.ip_) AS ip_count_ FROM ujcms_visit_log t WHERE t.date_ >= #{begin} AND t.date_ < #{end} AND t.count_ > 0 GROUP BY t.site_id_, t.entry_url_

SELECT tt.site_id_ AS site_id_, SUM(pv_count_) AS pv_count_, SUM(uv_count_) AS uv_count_, SUM(ip_count_) AS ip_count_, SUM(nv_count_) AS nv_count_, SUM(duration_) AS duration_, SUM(bounce_count_) AS bounce_count_ FROM (SELECT t.site_id_ AS site_id_ , SUM(t.count_) AS pv_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT t.uv_) ELSE 0 END AS uv_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT t.ip_) ELSE 0 END AS ip_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN t.new_visitor_ = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS nv_count_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) > 0 THEN MAX(duration_) ELSE 0 END AS duration_ , CASE WHEN SUM(t.count_) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS bounce_count_ FROM ujcms_visit_log t WHERE t.date_ >= #{begin} AND t.date_ < #{end} GROUP BY t.site_id_, t.si_) tt GROUP BY site_id_
mapper.update: update ujcms_visit_log set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id_ = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url_ = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entry_url_ = #{entryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_ = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_ = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_ = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_ = #{device,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, os_ = #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browser_ = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_agent_ = #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count_ = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, si_ = #{si,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uv_ = #{uv,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ip_ = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_ = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration_ = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, new_visitor_ = #{newVisitor,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_type_ = #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_visit_log (id_, site_id_, user_id_, url_, entry_url_, source_, country_, province_, device_, os_, browser_, user_agent_, count_, si_, uv_, ip_, date_, duration_, new_visitor_, source_type_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{device,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{si,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uv,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newVisitor,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.site_id_, t.user_id_, t.url_, t.entry_url_, t.source_, t.country_, t.province_, t.device_, t.os_, t.browser_, t.user_agent_, t.count_, t.si_, t.uv_, t.ip_, t.date_, t.duration_, t.new_visitor_, t.source_type_
